page.title: 16SURVEY OF GAMES IN SCHOOL
page.content: In the first year infant class the games the girls liked best were skipping, using the sandpit, mum's and dad's, running, and using the climbing frame.Class one boy's liked football and running best. In the second year infant class, the girl's liked skipping, the climbing frame,the sandpit. The boy's liked football best.In the first two years of juniors,the girl's liked stoolball, chess, running and the climbing frame. The boys liked football,rugby,chess and cricket. In the top junior class, the girls liked skipping,running, rounders and chess, the boys liked football,rugby,running and chess.There are 92 children in this school at the moment,and this survey is round the whole school.These games were the most popular to be played,not just in games lessons.
